page.title: 15The Hereford T.A. Centre.
page.content:
On Monday we visited the{Territorial {Army}Centre. When we got there the {Sergeant Major}took us up to his room. He told us that you must be seventeen and a half years old before you can join the T.A. The youngest soldier is just this age and the oldest is fifty four.(He must retire at fifty five.) At the Centre there are three{rifle {platoons}and one{mortar platoon.}There are thirty men in a platoon. When training they often go on a twenty two mile run with full gear. They train at weekends and, once a year, they go on a summer camp which may be abroad. The T.A. has two mottoes.
{MANU FORTE}_ God Willing. {CEDE NULLIS}_ Yield to None.
